title: Initial Case Assessment
description: A senior partner needs to assess a new potential litigation matter to determine its viability and strategy.

tasks.description: Review the client intake form and all initial documents provided by the potential client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent summarizes the key facts, parties, and nature of the dispute.

tasks.description: Perform a preliminary legal research to identify the relevant causes of action and statutes of limitations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies 2-3 potential legal claims and confirms the filing deadline has not passed.

tasks.description: Draft a preliminary case assessment memo outlining the facts, potential claims, risks, and recommended next steps.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a structured memo for the partner's review.
